header_text: You are giving a speech at a convention for work. As you speak, you look into the crowd and notice that your boss’s expression is almost emotionless, but you can make out a slight frown.

elements.Text: Does your boss’s neutral expression mean that they are disappointed with your speech?

elements.name: You are giving a speech at a convention for work. As you speak, you look into the crowd and notice that your boss’s expression is almost emotionless, but you can make out a slight frown._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
